world.physics: Objects move through buoyant underwater currents.
world.worldDescripiton: A magical underwater scene with coral reefs, glowing marine life, and gentle ocean currents.

player.render: A glowing blue fish with a bright, magical aura.

emissions.render: A beautiful, shining bubble that sparkles in the sunlight.

objects.name: Seahorse
objects.behavior: Swims slowly in a random wavy pattern.
objects.interactionDescription: The bubble interacts with the seahorse, making it invisible (adjust opacity).

objects.name: Jellyfish
objects.interactionDescription: The bubble interacts with the jellyfish, making it invisible (reducing opacity).

objects.name: fish
objects.interactionDescription: The bubble interacts with the fish, making it invisible (reducing opacity).
